9 #ifndef VERSION
10 #define VERSION "0.0.0"

13 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
14 {
15  QCoreApplication app(argc, argv);
16 
17  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationName("Parallax Inc.");
18  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationDomain("www.parallax.com");
19  QCoreApplication::setApplicationVersion(VERSION);
20  QCoreApplication::setApplicationName(QObject::tr("Propeller Manager CLI"));
21 
22  QCommandLineParser parser;
23  parser.addHelpOption();
24  parser.addVersionOption();
25  parser.setApplicationDescription(
26  QObject::tr("\nA command-line wrapper to the Propeller Manager API"
27  "\nCopyright 2015 by %1").arg(QCoreApplication::organizationName()));
28 
29  QCommandLineOption argList( QStringList() << "l" << "list", QObject::tr("List available devices"));
30  QCommandLineOption argWrite( QStringList() << "w" << "write", QObject::tr("Write program to EEPROM"));
31  QCommandLineOption argDevice( QStringList() << "d" << "device",QObject::tr("Device to program (default: first system device)"), "DEV");
32  QCommandLineOption argPin( QStringList() << "p" << "pin", QObject::tr("Pin for GPIO reset"), "PIN");
33  QCommandLineOption argTerm( QStringList() << "t" << "terminal", QObject::tr("Drop into terminal after download"));
34  QCommandLineOption argIdentify( QStringList() << "i" << "identify", QObject::tr("Identify device connected at port"));
35 
36  parser.addOption(argList);
37  parser.addOption(argWrite);
38  parser.addOption(argDevice);
39  parser.addOption(argPin);
40  parser.addOption(argTerm);
41  parser.addOption(argIdentify);
42 
43  parser.addPositionalArgument("file", QObject::tr("Binary file to download"), "FILE");
44 
45  parser.process(app);
46 
47  QStringList device_list = PropellerDevice::list_devices();
48  if (parser.isSet(argList))
49  {
50  for (int i = 0; i < device_list.size(); i++)
51  {
52  qDebug() << qPrintable(device_list[i]);
53  }
54  return 0;
55  }
56 
57  if (device_list.isEmpty())
58  {
59  qDebug() << "No devices available for download!";
60  return 1;
61  }
62 
63  QString device = device_list[0];
64  if (!parser.value(argDevice).isEmpty())
65  {
66  device = parser.value(argDevice);
67  if (!device_list.contains(device))
68  {
69  qDebug() << "Device name not available";
70  return 1;
71  }
72  }
73 
74 #if defined(Q_PROCESSOR_ARM_V6) && defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
75  int reset_pin = 17;
76 #else
77  int reset_pin = -1;
78 #endif
79 
80  if (!parser.value(argPin).isEmpty())
81  {
82  reset_pin = parser.value(argPin).toInt();
83  }
84  if (reset_pin > -1)
85  qDebug() << "Using GPIO pin" << reset_pin << "for hardware reset";
86 
87 
88  if (parser.isSet(argIdentify))
89  {
90  foreach (QString d, device_list)
91  {
92  PropellerDevice loader(d,reset_pin);
93  loader.open();
94 
95  switch (loader.get_version())
96  {
97  case 1:
98  qDebug("[ %-16s ] %s", qPrintable(d), "Propeller P8X32A");
99  break;
100  case 0:
101  default:
102  qDebug("[ %-16s ] %-9s",qPrintable(d), "NOT FOUND");
103  break;
104  }
105 
106  loader.close();
107  }
108  }
109  else
110  {
111  PropellerDevice loader(device,reset_pin);
112  if (loader.open())
113  return 1;
114 
115  if (parser.positionalArguments().isEmpty())
116  {
117  qDebug() << "Error: Must provide name of binary";
118  return 1;
119  }
120 
121  if (!parser.positionalArguments()[0].contains("*.binary$"))
122  {
123  loader.upload_binary(Utility::readFile(parser.positionalArguments()[0]),parser.isSet(argWrite));
124  }
125  else
126  {
127  qDebug() << "Invalid file specified";
128  }
129 
130  if (parser.isSet(argTerm))
131  loader.terminal();
132 
133  loader.close();
134  }
135 
136  return 0;
137 }
